panels.description: Peers connected with our execution client. Also number of peers we dialled and we are serving.
panels.title: Peers

panels.description: Lighthouse's reported current slot (unsafe not finalised)
panels.title: Current Slot

panels.description: The sync status for lighthouse's peers
panels.title: Peer Sync Status

panels.description: Peers that have dialed us. Indicates if our node is reachable
panels.title: Peer Type

panels.description: Identifies if there is an upstream execution client connected
panels.title: Eth1 Execution Client Connected

panels.description: Identifies if the consensus client is synced
panels.title: Eth2 Consensus Client Synced

targets.expr:
(
  sum(app_git_commit) by (git_hash)
)
   + on(job) group_left(version)
(
   0 * sum(app_version) by (version)
)
   + on(job) group_left(lock_hash)
(
   0 * sum(cluster_lock_hash) by (lock_hash)
)
   + on(job) group_left(threshold)
(
   0 * sum(cluster_threshold) by (threshold)
)
   + on(job) group_left(peer_name)
(
   0 * sum(app_peer_name) by (peer_name)
)
   + on(job) group_left(network)
(
   0 * sum(cluster_network) by (network)
)

panels.description: Is charon connected to a synced beacon client and a threshold of peers?
panels.title: Charon Status

panels.description: Current libp2p reachability status of this node as detected by AutoNat.
panels.title: P2P Reachability

targets.expr: node_memory_MemTotal_bytes - node_memory_MemFree_bytes - node_memory_Buffers_bytes - node_memory_Cached_bytes - node_memory_SwapCached_bytes - node_memory_Slab_bytes - node_memory_PageTables_bytes - node_memory_VmallocUsed_bytes

panels.description: Total Balance of Validators and beaconcha.in links for each public key.
panels.title: Validators

panels.description: A teku validator client serving as part of this distributed validator cluster
panels.title: TEKU

panels.description: Number of Validators with the given status.
panels.title: Validator Statuses

panels.description: Counters of each duty failed  by this cluster, separated by duty type
panels.title: Duties Failed
